Shivah:

"I'll be thankful Ender" said the male "That you help us to rescue 
Darkfate, I'll get all information vailable and we call you to do a 
plan.."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>        He stands up and walks out of the meeting.  "If anyone 
actually wants 
> my input I'll be looking for an empty room to sit in."  He begins 
wandering 
> around the ship.
